Sentence: In this paper, we report the first observation of super- conductivity above 70 K in a single-phase Pb1212 epitaxial film and its superconducting anisotropy.

Sentence: In Pb1212, an increase in the Ca concentration x leads to an increase in the hole carrier concentration and T c ; however, it is difficult to grow single-phase Pb1212 with large x.

Sentence: Although various T s c from 10 to 110 K have been reported for Pb1212 bulk polycrystalline samples, an impurity phase of superconducting PbSr 2 Ca 2 Cu 3 O 9 (Pb1223) with T c greater than 100 K often prevents the observation of intrinsic properties of Pb1212, especially at > x 0.4.
